name: groceries-shopping-list-app
description: Local-First Shopping List App with client and server

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.install:bun: bun install && cd client && bun install && cd ../server && bun install
scripts.install:yarn: yarn && cd client && yarn && cd ../server && yarn
scripts.install:npm: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/node_modules server/node_modules node_modules package-lock.json yarn.lock bun.lockb client/package-lock.json server/package-lock.json client/yarn.lock server/yarn.lock client/bun.lockb server/bun.lockb
scripts.setup:bun: bun run clean && bun run install:bun && bun run kill-ports && bun run start:bun
scripts.setup:yarn: yarn run clean && yarn run install:yarn && yarn run kill-ports && yarn run start:yarn
scripts.setup:npm: npm run clean && npm run install:npm && npm run kill-ports && npm run start:npm
scripts.check-ports: echo 'Checking port availability:' && (lsof -i:8085 && echo 'âŒ Port 8085 in use' || echo 'âœ… Port 8085 available')
